data.name: Come Together
data.detailed_description:
Connect with ThatsNotGames' audience


We have a Guilded Community where players and audience can chat, talk, stream, give feedback, ask questions, read related news, get updates and much more! Join us here.


About the Game


Come Together is not just a puzzle game. While completing different levels, you will be uncovering secrets, learning about new mechanics, items, abilities, unlocking hidden gamemodes and features, making new friends in this big world of Come Together. The game provides a very smooth and enjoyable playstyle.

Your main goal is to connect two squares together while thinking about most optimal solution for the level or particular gamemode. Come Together manages to squeeze maximum from this simple, at first sight, mechanic. In terms of Gameplay and Player Movement the game is not that complicared: all you need to know is the main rule - your player changes every time you make a move. Based on that, you will need to solve different puzzles and progress further into the game.

Apart from official levels, Come Together has lots of other gamemodes. They are not just about changing the playfield - they may completely overhaul playstyle, your goals, rules, the way you move or enjoy the game. Before you can access them, you should unlock them, of course: reach some goals, complete specific level, find somewhere or just buy. But thats not all: there are secret gamemodes as well. They can be unlocked by beating hidden levels or challenges.

Apart from all of that, Come Together has lots of other features, of course. Here are some main examples:
* Secret Levels: hidden all across the game, hidden levels are here to show you the craziest mechanics that pushing the game to it's limits.
* Shop: here you can buy different customizations for your players, cursor, Main Menu and much more.
* Statistics: achivements, counters and your full game reports are included!
* Inventory: find, collect, inspect different stuff and it will appear here. Just like in bestiaries.

data.short_description: Come Together is a puzzle game. Or... is it? Uncover secrets, learn about new mechanics, items, abilities, make new friends, unlock hidden gamemodes and features. All of that in a simple, friendly and enjoyable playstyle. World of Come Togther awaits!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64bit OS, GPU with DirectX 11/Vulkan/OpenGL support
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64bit OS, GPU with DirectX 12/Vulkan support

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Any modern 64bit distribution
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64bit OS, GPU with Vulkan/OpenGL support. Having Desktop Environment is preferable
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Any modern 64bit distribution
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64bit OS, GPU with Vulkan support. Having Desktop Environment is preferable
